Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory75.jpg'}
{2: 'Citizens', 3: 'Run—!'}
{2: 'Citizens', 3: 'Corrupted! Corrupted inside the factory—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nun', 3: 'Stop crying! Stop making noise!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: 'You got in the lift already, so stuff it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Boy A', 3: 'But, there are still so many who...'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "Never mind the others, just be glad you're still alive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Boy B', 3: "What's that sound?"}
{2: 'Citizens', 3: "It's Corrupted! The pulling device is stuck by Corrupted!"}
{2: 'Children', 3: 'Bwah—!'}
{2: 'Citizens', 3: "If this continues! We'll all fall down to the bottom!"}
{2: 'Little Boy B', 3: "My little sister! My little sister's caught!"}
{2: 'Little Boy B', 3: 'Sister, please! Help my little sister!'}
{2: 'Little Boy B', 3: 'Please...'}
{3: 'The sister shakes off the clinging boy.'}
{3: 'Then walks up to the front, stomps at the Corrupted, and kicks it off the lift.'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Big brother—'}
{2: 'Little Boy B', 3: "Don't worry, the old crone'll protect us..."}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "Don't be so optimistic, kid. From now on, only you can protect your sister.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Boy B', 3: 'What?'}
{3: 'The sister removes her hood and tears off a corner of her hampering dress, showing mechanical circuitry beneath her skin.'}
{3: 'A pair of bladed wings spread out of her back. She leaps and dives into the Corrupted-filled abyss down below.'}
